text: Juliana de Menis Campos (born 17 October 1996) is a Brazilian athlete specialising in the pole vault. She has won multiple medals at regional level. Her personal bests in the event are 4.56 metres outdoors (Castellón 2018) and 4.21 metres indoors (São Caetano do Sul 2018). ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="5"|Representing |- |2012 |South American Youth Championships |Mendoza, Argentina |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |3.45 m |- |rowspan=2|2013 |World Youth Championships |Donetsk, Ukraine |19th (q) |3.55 m |- |South American Junior Championships |Resistencia, Argentina |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |3.60 m |- |2014 |South American U23 Championships |Montevideo, Uruguay |bgcolor=silver|2nd |3.70 m |- |rowspan=2|2015 |South American Junior Championships |Cuenca, Ecuador |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |3.90 m |- |Pan American Junior Championships |Edmonton, Canada |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |4.00 m |- |2016 |South American U23 Championships |Lima, Peru |bgcolor=gold|1st |3.90 m |- |rowspan=3|2018 |South American Games |Cochabamba, Bolivia |bgcolor=silver|2nd |4.20 m |- |Ibero-American Championships |Trujillo, Peru |bgcolor=gold|1st |4.40 m |- |South American U23 Championships |Cuenca, Ecuador |bgcolor=gold|1st |4.40 m |- |rowspan=3|2019 |South American Championships |Lima, Peru |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |3.91 m |- |Universiade |Naples, Italy |5th |4.31 m |- |Pan American Games |Lima, Peru |8th |4.10 m |- |2020 |South American Indoor Championships |Cochabamba, Bolivia |bgcolor=silver|2nd |3.80 m |} ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian female pole vaulters Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Pan American Games competitors for Brazil Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:Competitors at the 2019 Summer Universiade
title: Juliana Campos
